attributes.action: Give Out of London Residents the Right to Vote for the London Mayor
attributes.additional_details: so we can vote for a new London Mayor
attributes.background: As a resident of Upminster, I am deeply concerned about the lack of representation and voice that out of London residents have in choosing our city's leader. It is time to address this issue and grant us the right to vote for the London Mayor.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634216
